The Facebook post contains three photos: 000 times since it was first posted on March 17, 2019.
One of the photos: featuring a woman wearing a pale hijab and glasses, was not captured in New Zealand and was found to be from a news story published by the Arkansas Democrat Gazette on February 15, 2016.
Another image included in the post: featuring a woman wearing a dark blue hijab and a beige coat, has appeared online on multiple web pages since at least January 2018 and was used in an article promoting hijabs for sale on medium.com.
